item.description:
Thursday, July 09 Music Performance - HarborWalk Sounds: Neara Russell
06:00 PM - 08:30 PM

Check out the ICA and live music free on the waterfront.

Berklee College of Music boasts some of the most talented students, alumni and faculty at work in music today, and there’s no better time and place to hear them than a summer evening at the ICA.

Enjoy the best of both institutions with HarborWalk Sounds, a free series of concerts featuring rising stars in jazz, world, Latin and more.

Relax on the harbor with a delicious drink from the Water Café and hot sounds from the coolest music school around. Admission is free.
item.name: Live Music / Free Admission @ ICA
